name: Dreamy Dimension Dive
description:
Gather the Keystones. Return through the Gate you entered. Don't concern yourself with what will happen to this place.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys Left/Right: Move
  • Arrow Key Down: Fast Fall/Short Hop (press Jump while holding)
  • Space Bar: Jump/Wall Jump
  • Shift: Toggle Background

(Gamepad is supported, using d-pad, A and B, but is partially bugged on Web version)
